Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Rawson KM, Lacey MM, Strong PN, Miller K. 2022
Literature.Reference: Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Jul 20;23(14):7979. doi: 10.3390/ijms23147979.PubMed
Literature.Title: Improving the Therapeutic Index of Smp24, a Venom-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide: Increased Activity against Gram-Negative Bacteria.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (95.83%) toSmp24K=L: 17%, G=S: 13%.Activity: active against E. coli JM109 (MIC 32 ug/ml), P.aeruginosa H085180216 (MIC 128 ug/ml), S. aureus SH1000 (MIC 16 ug/ml). MBC values are similar, indicating bactericidal.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 423 ug/ml, not hemo.lytic.Activity updated 12/2024
